scripts.deploy: graph deploy subgraph.yaml --verbosity debug --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs /ip4/127.0.0.1/tcp/5001 --subgraph-name dice2win
scripts.watch: graph deploy subgraph.yaml --watch --verbosity debug --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs /ip4/127.0.0.1/tcp/5001 --subgraph-name dice2win
